 A version of ~ spim with a distinct variable requirement instead of a bound variable hypothesis.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
spimv.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
spimv $p |- ( A. x ph -> ps ) $.
$d ps x $.
